channel.title: How to see files in client?
channel.description:
Okay so i downloaded this client for my server and it works pretty well for weapons and etc. I really wanna use this client. When I extracted the client after downloading, i saw that there were class files and stuff. When i completely extracted it, there was on "run.bat", "read me" and thats about it and class files or anything were there. Was wondering how maybe i could see files to add special weapons and stuff to the client, if any way possible? Thanks very much =D
(This may not be in right category i know.)

item.title: How to see files in client?
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Well wats a good client for 317 cammypvp source?

Read full topic
item.source: How to see files in client?

item.title: How to see files in client?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

If you want to change a weapon, first delete the .class file you want to edit, decompile the one class you want to edit, edit it, recompile.

Read full topic
item.source: How to see files in client?

item.title: How to see files in client?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

You should be in client help. not server

if you do not have the .java files i just recommend you get a new client. that one will be a bitch to edit lol.
if you only have the .class files you would have to decompile, decipher, and recode every file you wanted to edit.

Read full topic
item.source: How to see files in client?
